email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Elena,

I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out to offer a shipment of 25,000MT of wheat from Santos to Rotterdam on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 82,500 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is set for 15th to 20th November, and the loading window is 48 hours. The initial freight quote is USD 42.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 40.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Elena Martinez
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Elena,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 41.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 10,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 15th to 20th November, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 41.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Elena Martinez
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Elena,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Santos on 15th November, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Elena Martinez
Global Charterers
